public class RecipeService
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • createRecipe

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/new/{Name}/{Description}/{CostSmall}/{CostMedium}/{CostBig}")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String createRecipe(@PathParam(value="Name")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="Description")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="CostSmall")
                                                                                                                                                         int costSmall,
                                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="CostMedium")
                                                                                                                                                         int costMedium,
                                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="CostBig")
                                                                                                                                                         int costBig)
        Create new recipe and store it in the database

        Receives the necessary params to create the recipe then creates a connection to the database, insert recipe in database, close connection and last return a message of success or failure

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the recipe.
        description - Short description of the recipe that includes history and components.
        costSmall - Cost of 60ml of the beverage.
        costMedium - Cost of 80ml of the beverage.
        costBig - Cost of 100ml of the beverage.
        Returns:
        Return a message of success if the recipe was inserted or failure ir not

      • deleteRecipe

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="Delete/{RecipeID}")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String deleteRecipe(@PathParam(value="RecipeID")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String recipeID)
        Delete the selected recipe from the database

        Receives the recipeID that will be deleted then creates a connection to the database, delete the recipe in the database, close connection and last return a message of success or failure

        Parameters:
        recipeID - Unique identifier of the recipe.
        Returns:
        Return a message of success if the recipe was inserted or failure ir not

      • getAllRecipes

        @GET
 @Path(value="/all")
 @Produces(value="application/xml")
public java.util.List<RecipeDetails> getAllRecipes()
        Fetch all recipes from database and generate XML

        Creates a connection to the database then fetch every recipe and its components to inflate the java objects (RecipeDetails and RecipeComponents) and show the objects in XML format in the path: (Authority)/recipes/all

        Returns:
        Return an ArrayList of the recipes objects that will be shown in XML

      • updateRecipe

        @POST
 @Path(value="/update/{RecipeID}/{Name}/{Description}/{CostSmall}/{CostMedium}/{CostBig}")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String updateRecipe(@PathParam(value="RecipeID")
                                                                                                                                                                        int recipeID,
                                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="Name")
                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="Description")
                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="CostSmall")
                                                                                                                                                                        int costSmall,
                                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="CostMedium")
                                                                                                                                                                        int costMedium,
                                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="CostBig")
                                                                                                                                                                        int costBig)
        Update the selected recipe from the database

        Receives the parameters of the recipe that will be updated then creates a connection to the database, update the recipe in the database, close connection and last return a message of success or failure

        Parameters:
        recipeID - Unique identifier of the recipe.
        name - Name of the recipe.
        description - Short description of the recipe that includes history and components.
        costSmall - Cost of 60ml of the beverage.
        costMedium - Cost of 80ml of the beverage.
        costBig - Cost of 100ml of the beverage.
        Returns:
        Return a message of success if the recipe was inserted or failure ir not
